properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
MAURITANIA.
1. DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN 20-18N 018-04W
   AT 020329Z JAN. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC DAKAR, PHONE: 22 133 826 5001
   OR 22 133 869 2326, FAX: 22 133 820 0600.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 8/12.
